attributes.action: I n the light of proposed building of mega mosque,supply finance for scotish churches to the same value.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Sir i believe that your government cannot on one hand propose to build a mosque, and on the other refuse an equal sum of money for the building and restoration of Scottish churches such as the Parish Church in Garelochhead, which serves the personnel of H M Naval Base Faslane.this Church is 160 years old and in constant need of repair.
